text: James Roumanos (Arabic: جيمس رومانوس) is a Lebanese international rugby league footballer who plays as a or forward for the Canterbury-Bankstown Bulldogs in the National Rugby League (NRL). ==Career== Roumanos made his international debut for Lebanon in their 56-14 loss to Fiji in the 2019 Pacific Test. ==References== ==External Links== *Canterbury-Bankstown profile Category:1999 births Category:Australian people of Lebanese descent Category:Australian rugby league players Category:Lebanon national rugby league team players Category:Canterbury-Bankstown Bulldogs players Category:Rugby league second- rows Category:Rugby league locks Category:Living people
title: James Roumanos
